bibl.title: An Unpublished Petition to Flavius Olympius .
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III
bibl.author: Emmett, Alanna

bibl.note: Circa 343 A.D. Part of an archive relating to Aspidas of Hipponon. The petition consists of four pieces. We may suggest that taxes were involved.
Emmett Alanna, An Unpublished Petition to Flavius Olympius (PMacquarie Inv. 358).
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III (Napoli, 1984) pp. 825-828.
